Summary: Stephanie is doing well with the result of her recent surgery and local X-ray.
Full_Transcript: I spoke to Stephanie over the phone today, full stop, it is now some six weeks after her  first NTPJ fusion, full stop. She's doing very well and is very pleased with the result  of her recent surgery, full stop. She had the local X-ray, which I reviewed on the  pack server today and there does seem to be sound union, full stop. I've therefore discharged  her from further follow-up, full stop. However, she does know she can contact us if she develops  any further symptoms over the next year. So, in a way, a peafoo. Thanks very much.

Summary: Sophie's hip is feeling much better after her full recovery. Next follow-up visit in 3 months.
Actions: See Sophie again in outpatient clinic in 3 months
Full_Transcript: It was nice to see Sophie in outpatient clinic again today, full stop.  She's made a good recovery and her hip is feeling much better, full stop.  The x-rays she had today are also satisfactory, full stop.  There's no evidence of DVT.  See again outpatient clinic in three months with an x-ray on arrival.
